sentence.Network_en: Slow music encourages supermarket-shoppers to browse longer but spend more.
sentence.Network_cn: 舒缓的音乐会促使超市购物者花更长的时间浏览商品的同时花更多的钱。

sentence.Network_en: Fresh salmon is a bargain at the supermarket this week.
sentence.Network_cn: 这周超市的新鲜鲑鱼特价销售。

sentence.Network_en: Why should Melissa have to slog around the supermarket on her own?
sentence.Network_cn: 为什么梅利莎会一个人在超市里面费劲地转来转去？

PerfectNetExp.abs: 七年级英语单词表 ... bank 银行 supermarket 超级市场 pay 付钱;支付.
...，提供有限服务，商品价格低廉的一种小型超市业态。拥有不到2000个品种，经营一定数量的自有品牌商品。, 4、超市（supermarket）：是开架售货，集中收款，满足社区消费者日常生活需要的。根据的不同，可以分为食品超市和综合超市。, 5、大型超市（hypermarket）：实际营业面积6000平方米以上，品种齐全，满足顾客一次性购齐.
everything at that supermarket is cheap ., 那家超市里的什么东西都便宜.

otherwise , since the various kinds of " cups " and " gifts packing " were supplied to shopping-goods in all wholesale market , large store and supermarket .本厂产品不含铅不含镉，无毒，适用于微波炉，是环保日用工业品陶瓷，另外各款“杯类”和“礼品装”的推出，是现在市场批发和各大商场、超市的抢手货。

entry.def: A supermarket is a large shop which sells all kinds of food and some household goods.

example.ex: Most of us do our food shopping in the supermarket...
example.tran: 我们大多数人去超市购买食品。

example.ex: How do those prawns find their way from Norway to the supermarket shelf?
example.tran: 这些对虾是如何从挪威跑到超市货架上来的呢？

means.word_mean: 1. a large self-service grocery store selling groceries and dairy products and household goods

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Tesco was the best-performing supermarket of the Big Four.

auth_sentence.content: The supermarket filled with the produce of the world.
auth_sentence.res_content: The supermarket filled with the produce of the world.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The supermarket filled with the produce of the world.

auth_sentence.res_content: The crowns were ludicrously cheap and from the supermarket.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"在……上面"; 2. 表示"超级,超过,过度"

stems_affixes.word_buile: super在……上面+fic做+ial……的→在表面上做
super超级,超过,过度+annuated有年纪的→adj.老迈的,老式的
super超级,超过,过度+cili眉毛+ous……的→在眉毛上看人→目中无人
super超级,超过,过度+flu流+ous……的→超过了流出来
super超级,超过,过度+natural自然的→adj.超自然的
super超级,超过,过度+sensitive敏感的→adj.过度敏感的
super超级,超过,过度+sized大小的→adj.超大型的
super超级,超过,过度+sonic音速的→adj.超音速的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 极度的, 极大的, 至高的, 最高的
stems_affixes.word_buile: supre=super超级,超过,过度+eme→adj.极度的, 极大的, 至高的, 最高的
super在……上面+stit建立+ion表名词→建立在人[理智]之上的东西→迷信
super超级,超过,过度+market市场→n.超级市场
super在……上面+impose放上去→在上面放→强加
super在……上面+intend想要,打算→在上面算计→监督
super在……上面+sede=side坐→坐上去→淘汰[以前的东西]
super在……上面+vis看+e→在上面看→临视
super超级,超过,过度+charge收费,负担→负担过重

Sentence.sentence: She will drive the man to the supermarket.
The supermarkets outside the city are so much cheaper.
Lisa, have you been to the new supermarket yet?
She failed to get into the supermarket last Saturday
Perfectly eatable fruit and vegetable crops often fail to reach supermarkets due to their size or physical appearance.

sentences.en: They bought food at the supermarket.
sentences.cn: 他们在超级市场买了食物。

jushi.english: They buy food at the supermarket.
jushi.chinese: 他们在超级市场买食物。
